law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 7, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 2, effective July 1, 1954. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 11. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4281a-45.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Payment of proceeds of insurance policy or annuity contract.
